author: Karlee Weinmann
title: North Loop rents rising as tech moves in
text:
Home / News / Business & Economy / North Loop rents rising as tech moves in The North Loop is full of revamped industrial spaces with high ceilings, with interiors peeled back to their original brick and concrete. This meeting room at LHBâ€™s 701 Washington Ave. N. office is a converted freight elevator. (Staff photo: Bill Klotz) North Loop rents rising as tech moves in By: Karlee Weinmann September 8, 2015 2:55 pm 0 A CBRE report finds the average asking rent jumped from $20 per square foot per year over the past two years.
